title: PICS: Justin Theroux recreates iconic 'Lady and the Tramp' spaghetti scene with his dog
text:
PICS: Justin Theroux recreates iconic 'Lady and the Tramp' spaghetti scene with his dog

Cape Town – Justin Theroux shared a plate of spaghetti with his dog, and it's the cutest thing you will see today.

The Leftover actor stars in Disney's live-action remake of Lady and the Tramp set to be released on the streaming service in December.

Based on the 1955 movie it follows a pampered house dog, Lady and a stray dog, Tramp who embark on an unexpected romantic adventure. Tessa Thompson will voice Lady, and Justin voices Tramp.

On Tuesday the 48-year-old attended the screening for the film in New York and took his dog, Kuma as his plus one.

While there he recreated the iconic spaghetti scene from the movie with his rescue pit bull.

SEE THE PICS HERE:

(A SPAGHETTI KISS: Justin Theroux attends a special screening of Disney+'s "Lady And The Tramp" at iPic Theater in New York City. Photo by Dimitrios Kambouris/Getty Images for Disney+)

During a red-carpet interview with ET Online, he revealed that Kuma appears in the movie as a pound dog and that it was her first premiere.

"It's her first premiere. It's her first part in a movie! It's her first movie, red carpet. She's done animal work kind of red carpets", he said.
